about_the_game:
Buy or find a variety of cars, including sports cars, classic models, and exotic vehicles, and start tuning them in "Tune My Car - Tuning Studio & Car Mechanic Simulator 2023". You'll be able to customize every detail, bringing your ideas to life. Change the body, install aerodynamic kits, choose unique wheels and tuning parts to give your car a distinctive style.
But tuning is not just about the exterior. In "Tune My Car - Tuning Studio & Car Mechanic Simulator 2023", you can improve the car's performance by tuning the engine, exhaust system, suspension, and transmission. Unlock various modifications to achieve maximum power and dynamics for your car.


Gradually expand your workshop, acquire new tools and equipment to tackle even the most challenging tuning projects. Fulfill orders from clients who expect you to create their dream on wheels. Showcase your skills and creative approach to meet the most demanding requests. After completing the work, take your car for a test drive, experience it on racing tracks and city streets.
Unleash your talents and create the most beautiful and powerful cars. Are you ready to take on the challenge and turn ordinary cars into works of art?
Game Features:

Wide selection of cars: Choose from a diverse range of car models, including sports cars, classic models, and exotic vehicles.
Extensive tuning options: Customize every detail of your car, from body modifications and aerodynamic kits to unique wheels and tuning parts, to create a unique style.

Performance enhancement: Improve your car's performance by tuning the engine, exhaust system, suspension, and transmission to achieve maximum power and dynamics.
Expansion of the workshop: Gradually expand your tuning workshop by acquiring new tools and equipment to take on more challenging projects.

Test drive and racing: Take your customized car for a test drive on racing tracks and city streets, evaluating its performance in practice.
Creative self-expression: Unleash your creative energy and turn ordinary cars into stunning works of art on wheels.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: "Tune My Car - Tuning Studio & Car Mechanic Simulator 2023" is an exciting game where you become a master of car tuning. Immerse yourself in the thrilling world of automotive customization and unleash your creative energy by transforming ordinary cars into unique works of art on wheels.
